nodes.text: Santos Bel-Pak was a poet laureate of Kooriva and a professor emeritus at the Lebrasa Argente School for the Arts and Persuasive Sciences. He was celebrated for his mixed media techniques, blending kinetic choreography and procedural with chaos-based rendering techniques. During the Separatist Crisis, Santos Bel-Pak created an anti-Military Creation Act propaganda piece titled Political Doubletalk for the United Committee for Galactic Peace, a front for the Gotal terrorist group, Roshu Sune.
